prey.description:
Slash and Lingering Swords get +2 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.
Leaping Sword gets +10 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.

leaping-sword.description: Launches at any targeted Bloon on screen doing 20 damage, +80 MOAB damage (100), 30 pierce, and spawns Lingering Swords. Can pop all Bloon types.

sword-charge.description: Charges backwards on all tracks doing 30 damage on up to 400 Bloons each.

editItems.value:
Slash and Lingering Swords get +2 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.
Leaping Sword gets +10 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.
Sword Charge gets +15 damage, +30 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.

Slash and Lingering Swords get +2 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons.
Slash gets +1 damage, +10 bonus MOAB damage to Bloons slowed or taking damage over time (not including Sauda's Bloon Bleed).
Leaping Sword gets +10 damage, +20 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons and Bloons slowed or taking damage over time (not including Sauda's Bloon Bleed).
Sword Charge gets +15 damage, +30 bonus MOAB damage to stunned Bloons and Bloons slowed or taking damage over time (not including Sauda's Bloon Bleed).
